EmailTemplate.name: Quotes Research Required - 2nd Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION REQUIRED - Reminder {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are working on your quote!
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Part Number:
To support further research and ensure proper material and certifications are provided, please share:
1. Cage Code: 2. Next Higher Assembly P/N : 3. End Item P/N: 4. Component Maintenance Manual: 5. Aircraft Model:
This is our 2nd attempt to retrieve information. If we have not received your response in the next 3 business days, the subject case and your request will be closed in our system.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
